price: 37.Tokkel kay mari kaa dirabboyseeh, tohih sabbatah gibdi baaxóh angoyyi ken tibbixeeh, sinni dabooqal rabeenih maacisen guluuba keenik baaxot kafimih anuk.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
